rankings.title: Does Sanitation Drive Development? Satellite Evidence from India's Swachh Bharat Mission
conditions: validating ODF timing with independent sanitation/use measures such as NFHS/other surveys
using monthly VIIRS or an exposure-weighted treatment definition
excluding major urban pixels to reduce dilution

rankings.title: Piped Water and Rural Development: Early Evidence from India's Jal Jeevan Mission
conditions: using treatment intensity—%FHTC—rather than a 100% threshold
ensuring ≥2–3 post years for a meaningful treated set
pre-registering robustness to alternative timing/exposure definitions
